cast.name: 莉莉丝·斯坦根博格 Lilith Stangenberg

writer.name: 苏达贝∙摩特扎伊 Sudabeh Mortezai

director.name: 苏达贝∙摩特扎伊 Sudabeh Mortezai

introduction: Beate is an ambitious executive working at EUROPA, a mysterious corporation looking to expand into the Balkans region. Seemingly promoting philanthropy and investment in underdeveloped areas, Europa actually needs to buy off lands from locals in a remote valley in Southern Albania using Beate as the main negotiator for this ambiguous mission. But things don’t go as planned when she is challenged by Jetnor, a stubborn and spiritual farmer who refuses to leave the land of his ancestors.源自：https://tickets.sff.ba/films/2232
